name: Paragraph naming convention - prefix control
description:
Names of Paragraphs should start with X. 
The prefix value is a parameter that can be changed at will
output:
This report lists all Paragraphs whose name does not start with X.
It provides the following information:
Cobol Paragraph full name
rationale: For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention
